<title level="1" right="Rules">[Basic Magic Armor](/Rules.aspx?ID=713)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 556 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The most common special armors are suits of armor with some combination of [_armor potency_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=278) and [_resilient_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) runes. The [_magic armor_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=147) stat block provides a quick reference for these types of armor.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
